Package mireka.submission

Filters and configuration objects related to receiving mail from a MUA (Mail User Agent).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
LoginSpecification verifies username, password combinations, returns detailed result
MailTransactionSpecification  
 

Class Summary
ConnectedFromAuthorizedIpAddress  
GlobalUser represents a user, who is a valid recipient in all (local) domains in the form of USERNAME@LOCAL_DOMAIN, and who uses a password for login.
GlobalUsers GlobalUsers is a simple collection of GlobalUser instances, this class is useful in CDI XML configuration.
GlobalUsersLoginSpecification  
GlobalUsersRecipientSpecification A RecipientSpecification which accepts those recipient addresses where the local part case insensitively matches any of the user names in the supplied GlobalUsers collection.
IpAddress a single IP address or a subnet
RejectIfUnauthenticated Rejects the MAIL command if the session has not been authenticated.
SmtpAuthenticated  
Username case-insensitive user name, where case-insensitivity is defined by the en_US locale.
UsernamePasswordValidatorImpl TODO: prevent brute-force attack on passwords
 

Enum Summary
LoginResult  
 

Package mireka.submission Description

Filters and configuration objects related to receiving mail from a MUA (Mail User Agent).
